import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link,useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from "axios"; function Registration() { const [values,setValues] = useState({ fname:'', email:'', mobile:'', fpassword:'' }) const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault(); axios.post("http://localhost:4500/reg/",values) .then(res=>{ console.log(res); alert("registration sucessful"); navigate('/'); }) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) } return (

Registration Page

setValues({...values,fname:e.target.value})}>



setValues({...values,email:e.target.value})}>





setValues({...values,mobile:e.target.value})}>



setValues({...values,fpassword:e.target.value})}>













) } export default Registration
